name: InfiniteTech FIXED
title: Infinite Technologies FIXED for 2.0 and Space Age
author: KyriadosX
description:
Initially uploaded by Optera, now (partially) fixed for 2.0 Space Age. Adds infinite technologies for bot cargo capacity, player logistics slots, and inserter capacity.
Normalizes infinite technologies to 60s and exponential 2^N formula; either can be disabled in startup settings. 
Bot battery infinite tech was removed due to user coding inadequacy. Please refer to Github link for information.
